name: Billiard Blast
description:
Classic Match 3 puzzle game - Billiard Style!

Match 3 or more of the same balls in a row horizontally or vertically by swiping to swap balls.

200 levels that progress in difficulty as you advance.
-Different level designs
-More Balls

Fun for all ages!

Featuring regulars from the world renowned billiard hall, The Green Room, in Jackson, MS.
